Today (2025-Apr-28) is Thargēliṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Θαργηλιῶνος, day 297 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
This Thargēliṓn will have 30 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) as opposed to a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) of 29.

Festivals in Thargēliṓn:

6: Birthday of Artemis
6–7: Thargelia (Θαργήλια)
7: Birthday of Apollo
19: Bendideia (Βενδίδεια)
25: Plynteria (Πλυντήρια)
